item.title: The Astromancer [Blue Dragon Killer]
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
The Astromancer
Blue Dragon Killer

Passives:
Star Cloak: You are immune to occupation and redirection. You cannot be converted.
Influencial Sphere: Players caught in your sphere of influence have access to a private chat with you and cannot be visited.

Day:
Forced Satellite (inf use): Catch a player in your sphere of influence at the end of the day, allowing them to talk to you at all times afterwards. You cannot have more than 2 players caught at the same time.

Night:
Escape Velocity (inf use): Release a player from your sphere of influence.
Star Shower (2 use): Kill all players currently caught in your sphere of influence. Lose all charges if you kill a member of the Blue Dragons this way.

This is a Prince replacement, maybe even Mystic too
